summary: An end of the world battle between gangsters, cops and zombies.
cast: Claude Perron|Jean-Pierre Martins|Eriq Ebouaney|Aurélien Recoing|Doudou Masta|Antoine Oppenheim|Jo Prestia|Yves Pignot|Adam Pengsawang|Sébastien Peres|Laurent Demianoff|Alain Figlarz|Stéphane Orsolani|Ali Karamoko|Maud Heywang|Marie Vincent|Mohamed Kerriche|Vincent Haquin|Laurent Segall|Maximilien Poullein|Cédric Boyer|Raphael Casadesus|Yannick Dahan|Bruce Henrionnet|Gauthier Lamothe|Jimmy Philémond-Montout|Benjamin Rocher|Pierre Zéni
title: La horda
